channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 初次使用hugo
item.description: FirstTime to use hugo hugo new site myblog git clone https://github.com/digitalcraftsman/hugo-agency-theme hugo server -t hugo-agency-theme --buildDrafts hugo new post/blog.md hugo --theme=hugo-grapes --baseUrl="https://yb19960120.github.io/" --buildDrafts cd public git init git add . git commit -m "first2hugo" git remote add origin https://github.com/yb19960120/yb19960120.github.io.git git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories(我第二次换主题的时候用了这个) git push -u origin master
